events.name: Getting started with GCP and ML APIs

venue.name: SocialCops
venue.address_1: 3rd Floor, Building No. 261, Lane No 5, Westend Marg, Said-ul-Ajaib, Saket, Saiyad ul Ajaib, Sainik Farm, New Delhi, Delhi 11003

group.name: Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi

events.description:
[UPDATE (07th June)]: Invites have been rolled out. Check your mail for the confirmation mail. Here is the agenda for the day:

11 AM - 11.30 AM: Introduction to Kubernetes and Google Cloud Platform
11.30 AM - 12 Noon: Introduction to ML and ML APIs in GCP
12 Noon - 1 PM: Codelab on Cloud Vision API
1 PM - 2 PM: Codelab on Cloud Speech and NLP API

Note: If in case you are unable to attend, kindly inform at the earliest so that we can share the invite with the person in the waiting list. If in case you have not received the invite, you might be in the waitlist. We have received an overwhelming response for the meetup. However, due to limited venue capacity we won't be able to accommodate everyone.

Join us for first meetup of Google Cloud Developer Community, New Delhi with the support of SocialCops, where we'll bring together cloud enthusiasts and the developer community to learn on how to get started with Google Cloud Platform and use of some of Machine Learning APIs provided by GCP.

LINK TO THE REGISTRATION FORM : https://goo.gl/forms/T4wMz9JbdifqVXpF2. (Deadline: 5th June, 2018)
This is an invite only based event!

Date: 9th June, 2018
Time: 11 AM - 2 PM
Venue: SocialCops, Saket

Agenda coming up soon!

events.name: Next '18 Extended New Delhi

group.name: Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi

events.description:
**VENUE UPDATE**
Venue: Investopad, 18, Institutional Area, Prem Puri, Sector 32, Gurugram, Haryana[masked] (Directions: https://goo.gl/F1sQA6)

**SLIGHT UPDATE IN AGENDA**
**REGISTRATIONS CLOSED. INVITES TO BE ROLLED OUT SOON.**

**AGENDA UPDATED**
Agenda:
10AM - 10.30AM: Registrations
10.30AM - 10.45AM: Welcome and Introductions
10.45AM - 11.00AM: Overview of Google Cloud Platform by Siddhant Agarwal
11.00AM - 11.45AM: Best of Next'18 by Vishal Bhardwaj
11.45AM - 12.45PM: Hands-on session on ML by Siddhant Agarwal
12.45PM - 1.15PM: Creating Serverless ChatBots using Dialogflow & Google Cloud + Demo by Aayush Arora
1.15PM - 2:00PM: Break + Networking
2.00PM - 4.00PM: Session on Firebase ML Kits by Harshit Dwivedi (Prerequisites for Session on Firebase ML Kits : Basics of Android development)

Join Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi as we celebrate and learn about the exciting announcements at Google Cloud Next (https://cloudnext.withgoogle.com/)! We will kick off with highlights from the event. We will then have some food and networking and transition to ML codelabs.

Agenda: Coming up soon!
Venue: Investopad, 18, Institutional Area, Prem Puri, Sector 32, Gurugram, Haryana[masked] (Directions: https://goo.gl/F1sQA6)
LINK TO THE REGISTRATION FORM : https://goo.gl/forms/I3lEbbcR6TzqPJ1x1. (Deadline: 5th August, 2018)
This is an invite only based event!

Get started with Google Cloud today! Don't have an account? Fear not! New users can register (https://cloud.google.com/free/) and receive $300.00 in credits (which last 12 months), and also you can leverage the Always Free tier (https://cloud.google.com/free/).

events.name: MLCC Study Jam New Delhi

venue.name: SocialCops
venue.address_1: 3rd Floor, Building No. 261, Lane No 5, Westend Marg, Said-ul-Ajaib, Saket, Saiyad ul Ajaib, Sainik Farm, New Delhi, Delhi 11003

group.name: Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi

events.description:
**UPDATE**
DEADLINE EXTENDED: 19th August, 2018

New to Machine Learning but don’t know where to start? Join us for a Machine Learning Study Jam by Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi, GDG New Delhi and WTM New Delhi where we will run through the Machine Learning Crash Course (MLCC)!

This course is intended for those who wish to learn about ML from a practical, applied perspective that will enable you to use machine learning in your everyday projects and learn about the power of TensorFlow. This is a great opportunity for anyone with basic technical knowledge and limited Machine Learning knowledge willing to gain some practical experience in ML and TensorFlow.

Register here: http://www.goo.gl/3w5M8W (Mandatory)
(Deadline: 19th August, 2018)
This is an invite only based event!
Note: Please register only if you will be able to attend Study Jam on all three days.

**Bring your laptop!**

Agenda: (Note: This is Agenda for 1st September session)
11 AM: Event Start
11:30 AM: Overview & First 3 modules of MLCC
1:30 PM: Break
2:30PM: TensorFlow modules
4:00PM: Event End

Venue: SocialCops, Saket, New Delhi

Dates: September 1,8,15

events.name: DevFest OnAir

group.name: Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi

events.description:
Hi Developer,

We’ve created the perfect way for you to learn all about Google’s new technologies without leaving your desk—DevFest OnAir. Inspired by our popular worldwide DevFest events, DevFest OnAir offers free, online access to exclusive content.

Save the date: DevFest OnAir is December 11th (Americas) and December 12th (EMEA and APAC)!

We’ll have round-the-clock broadcasts covering a wide range of topics—including Cloud, Machine Learning, Android, Assistant, Web & more.

This virtual DevFest celebration will be broadcast around the clock, and you’ll get to see:

Sessions from more than a dozen live DevFest events
Never-before-seen DevBytes and insights from Google
Behind-the-scenes footage of DevFest events around the world
Q&A forums

You’ll even have a chance to win cool prizes and giveaways—all without leaving your desk!

But the learning doesn’t end there. Everyone who attends DevFest OnAir will receive free unlimited access to Qwiklabs, Google’s Cloud training platform, for one month.

This is an event you don’t want to miss. Register today—and spread the word to your colleagues on social media with #DevFestOnAir18!

Register here: https://devfest.withgoogle.com/events/devfestonair18

events.name: Machine Learning and Cloud for Startups

group.name: Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi

events.description:
Google Cloud Developer Community, New Delhi, Google Developer Groups New Delhi and Women Techmakers, New Delhi in association with NASSCOM 10k Startups presents "ML and Cloud for Startups" supported by Hartron Innovation Campus.

Here is tentative agenda for the event:
10:00 - 10:30 Registrations
10:30 - 11:00 Introductions (NASSCOM Introduction, Community Introduction, HARTRON Introduction)
11:00 - 11:30 Session on Google Cloud Platform
11:30 - 11:45 Tea Break
11:45 - 12: 15 Session on NLP and Chatbots
12:15 - 12:45 Session on ML
12:45 - 01:45 NASSCOM Startup Pitching
01:45 - 02:30 Networking & Lunch

Link to Register: https://gdgnd.org/gcdc-new-delhi/fill-form?data_form_entity_id=21 (Deadline: 17th Jan, 2019)

P.S. It is mandatory to fill registration form

events.name: Cloud Study Jam: Introductory - Kubernetes

venue.name: SocialCops
venue.address_1: 3rd Floor, Building No. 261, Lane No 5, Westend Marg, Said-ul-Ajaib, Saket, Saiyad ul Ajaib, Sainik Farm, New Delhi, Delhi 11003

group.name: Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi

events.description:
Register here (Mandatory):
https://gdgnd.org/gcdc-new-delhi/fill-form?data_form_entity_id=30

Join us for a introductory Kubernetes Cloud Study Jam by Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi as we take you through the fundamentals of building cloud native solutions using Kubernetes!

**Bring your Laptop**

This Cloud Study Jam will be hands-on and lay the groundwork of building and running your app on Google Kubernetes Engine in Google Cloud Platform. We'll use Qwiklabs to take you through a firsthand experience. The Cloud Study Jam will also grant you free access to Qwiklabs platform for 30 days so you can continue your learning.

Agenda:
10:00 AM - Event Registrations
11:00 AM - Event Start and Introduction to Containers and Kubernetes
11:30 AM - Introduction to Docker
12:30 PM - Lunch
1:15 PM - Hello Node Kubernetes
2:30 PM - Build a Slack Bot with Node.js on Kubernetes
4:00 PM - Event End

Venue - SocialCops, 3rd Floor, Building No. 261, Lane No 5, Westend Marg, Said-ul-Ajaib, Saket, Saiyad ul Ajaib, Sainik Farm, New Delhi, Delhi 11003 · Delhi

Date - 9th February 2019

Also, follow us on Twitter for updates: @gcdc_nd (https://twitter.com/gcdc_nd)

events.name: TF DevSummit Viewing Party

group.name: Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi

events.description:
Register here (Mandatory): https://gdgnd.org/gcdc-new-delhi/fill-form?data_form_entity_id=41

TensorFlow Dev Summit brings together a diverse mix of machine learning users from around the world for two days of highly technical talks, demos, and conversation with the TensorFlow team and community.

Join Google Cloud Developer Community New Delhi as we showcase some of the highlights from TensorFlow Dev Summit in this viewing party.

It is no question that machine learning is one of the hottest and one of the most important technology topics for developers and we think you can use this event as an opportunity to build a network within local machine learning community or engage with local machine learning users!

Agenda:
10:00 AM -10.30 AM Registration
10:45 AM - 11:15 AM Keynote
11:15 AM -12:00 PM Intro to Tensorflow by Shubhi Sareen
12:00PM-12: 45 PM Sneak peek into Tensorflow Architecture by Sakshi Shukla
12:45 PM - 1:45 PM Break
1:45 PM - 2:30 PM Tensorflow.js 101 by Pratyush Goel
2:30 PM - 3:15 PM ML for mobiles using Tensorflow Lite by Avinash Hindupur
3:15 PM - 4:00 PM Networking Session

Venue: 91Springboard, C2, Sector 1, Noida, Uttar Pradesh[masked]

Join the conversation:
Slack - https://bit.ly/2HguN98
Twitter - @gcdc_nd
Facebook - @gcdc-nd
